turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about The Serpent's Egg (film).
turn.1: What does Max say to Abel?
turn.2: The only sentence in Max's suicide note Abel can make out reads: "There's poisoning going on".
turn.3: How does Abel react to the note?
turn.4: In an attempt to drown his sorrow Abel goes on a drinking binge which lingers into the early hours and spends the night at Manuela's house.
turn.5: What does Manuela say to Abel?
turn.6: The next morning the two discuss possible new career paths Abel could look into.
turn.7: What does Abel do after looking into new career paths?
turn.8: After Manuela leaves for work Abel steals from her in order to buy alcohol.
turn.10: He is later taken by police to the mortuary in order to identify a series of bodies, the first of which turns out to be that of Gretha Hofer, his brother's former fiancée who died by drowning.
turn.12: He is also shown the body of another man who was murdered by a lethal injection; he does not know the man but comments that he looks remarkably like his deceased father.
